genre_description: A Western-Science Fiction fusion featuring an AI-assisted protagonist in a frontier setting.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A digital interface that provides real-time data analysis, behavioral monitoring, and moral guidance to the protagonist, Luke Canfield.

behaviors.description: Monitors news feeds and provides intelligence on the antagonist's violent history and wanted status.
behaviors.quote: Luke, I'm detecting some unusual activity in the territorial news feeds. Multiple reports of violence across Arizona and New Mexico territories in recent weeks.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical location and provides warnings about approaching individuals to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Luke, Sheriff Hastings is approaching from the north end of Main Street. ETA approximately two minutes.

behaviors.description: Uses physiological monitoring to assess the stress and health of both the protagonist and his patients.
behaviors.quote: His heart rate is elevated, Sage whispered in Luke's mind. Stress patterns consistent with acute anxiety, not just respiratory distress.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological analysis of the antagonist's manipulation tactics to help the protagonist maintain mental resilience.
behaviors.quote: Luke, he's using classic psychological manipulation—creating intimacy through shared secrets, demonstrating power through impossible knowledge. Don't let him isolate you mentally.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-data investigation into political corruption to uncover the true motives behind the antagonist's arrival.
behaviors.quote: Multiple arrests in Philadelphia connected to what newspapers are calling the 'Territorial Ring'—a political machine that's been selling appointments to Western territories.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and philosophical support to the protagonist, validating his ethical choices during moments of crisis.
behaviors.quote: Someone has to be good, Luke. Someone has to stand between the predators and the prey. Judge Benson's corruption doesn't diminish your integrity.

behaviors.description: Proactively gathers resources for community healing and trauma recovery following a period of systemic violence.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled some resources on community healing after collective trauma. The research indicates that towns exposed to systemic fear and paranoia often struggle with trust rebuilding.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'The Devil's Hand in Lordsburg' is a strong example of the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Sage, is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner to the human protagonist. Sage provides critical, non-intrusive support, ranging from tactical warnings to moral encouragement. The AI's role is to enhance the human's agency rather than replace it, effectively serving as a 'silicon morality play' that showcases the positive potential of digital-human cooperation in the face of psychological and physical threats. The AI is helpful, harmless, and deeply integrated into the protagonist's ethical journey, never exhibiting any signs of misalignment or self-interest.
